page.title: 11SPRINGFIELD NURSERIES-BLACKO
page.content: Springfield Nurseries is a small family business involved in the propagation of rooted{HEATHER cuttings. Heather Cuttings are taken from stock plants and then propagated in wooden seed trays using a 'mist unit'. When rooted and approximately 2 inches in height the cuttings are ready for sale to other nurseries throughout the country who are involved in growing cuttings into saleable plants. Deliveries are made to the Isle of Lewis in the north of Scotland, Cornwall in the south, Belfast in Northern Ireland as well as Wales and the East coast. Mr. Holden takes most deliveries himself. At the present time the number of staff is Mr. and Mrs. Holden and 2 young teenagers involved in the{Youth {Training Scheme.
